```{r libs_mod2, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(prophet)
```

```{r}
new <- read_csv("2960933.csv")
```


```{r}
new_temps <- new%>%
  select(6:11) %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

  mutate(date=as.POSIXct(date),
    year=lubridate::year(date),.after=date) 
```


```{r}
library(mgcv)
library(tidymv)
model <- gam(tavg~prcp+snow +tmax+tmin,data=new_temps)
summary(model)
```


```{r}
model_p <- predict_gam(model)
```


```{r}
model_p %>%
  ggplot(aes(tmax, fit)) +
  geom_point()

  geom_smooth_ci()
```
